Posts.Content: The ultrasound was the first thing that didn't show cancer. I kept returning the doctor saying 'something is wrong' (inside my breast). A biopsy was ordered and the biopsy showed cancer. The subsequent MRI, x-ray, and catscan showed cancer. But the mammogram among that series of tests that week was repeated several times during my visit and each time showed no cancer. I was sent a letter in the mail that said I was all clear and good for another year!
Posts.Title: Anyone diagnosed with cancer after negative mammo and ultrasound?

Posts.Content: Younger women often have dense tissue that appears as a sheet of white on those mammograms! So, yes, I was diagnosed with breast cancer and scheduled for a double mastectomy and sent for a mammogram that showed I was good to go for another year! That was the start of the rollar coaster. Â A year after my surgery, that radiology company sent a letter to me reminding me to schedule my yearly mammagram. (inconsiderate, poor paper work)
Posts.Title: Anyone diagnosed with cancer after negative mammo and ultrasound?
